channel.title: Docker Hub on Jérôme Decoster
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Hub on

item.title: ECS + Service Discovery + Node + Redis
item.description: Create **2 services on ECS** linked by **Service Discovery** using **Terraform**.

item.title: ECS + Load Balancer + Node + Terraform
item.description: Get **metadata task**. Scale **tasks behind a Load balancer** using **ecs-cli** or **Terraform**.

item.title: Docker + ECS + Fargate
item.description: Use Docker to **develop locally**. Host docker image on **Docker Hub** and **ECR**. Deploy manually with **ECS Fargate**. Deploy again with **ecs-cli**.
